content.en: Brake optimization: Researchers have used various algorithms to optimize the design and performance of braking systems. These algorithms, such as simulated annealing, particle swarm optimization, and genetic algorithms, are employed to enhance the mechanical performance, increase braking torque capacity, reduce brake squeal, and improve braking stability. The use of these algorithms allows for the optimization of braking systems in terms of weight, response time, dynamic range, and structural topology, among other factors.
content.da: Bremseoptimering: Forskere har anvendt forskellige algoritmer til at optimere design og ydeevne af bremsesystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom simuleret annealing, partikel-sværm optimering og genetiske algoritmer, bruges til at forbedre den mekaniske ydeevne, øge bremsemoment kapaciteten, reducere bremsekvælden og forbedre bremse stabiliteten. Brugen af disse algoritmer giver mulighed for at optimere bremsesystemer med hensyn til vægt, responstid, dynamisk rækkevidde og strukturel topologi, blandt andre faktorer.
